metadata.title: CVE-2022-41850 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
roccat_report_event in drivers/hid/hid-roccat.c in the Linux kernel through5.19.12 has a race condition and resultant use-after-free in certainsituations where a report is received while copying a report->value is inprogress.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-41850` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic-lpae - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic-64k - 6.1.0-16.16
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-aws - 6.2.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-azure - 6.2.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-gcp - 6.2.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1001-ibm - 6.2.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1002.2
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-lowlatency-64k - 6.2.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-oracle - 6.2.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1004-raspi - 6.2.0-1003.3
linux-image-6.2.0-1004-raspi-nolpae - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required
